segments.text: What a cozy kitchen, but things are going wrong here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is polishing that plate so carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how domestic it looks with the open cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But look at that faucet running wild, overflowing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious, standing in the water without a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to no good with that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretched out on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It could fall any second, and then what?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, hand out like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked on the counter, water ruining the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a mess waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks perfect, what a contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one is stopping this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
